pageProps.description_en: Written in React, this website allows you to listen to a variety of films and series in just a few clicks, whether on computer or mobile. On the first visit, you can see all the films and series available, classified by genre (Ex: Action, Comedy, etc.) each in their respective carousel. A search page is also available to easily find a video either by name or genre. The application also includes some user-friendly features, for example: A section to continue listening to a film that has not been finished, a button that appears towards the end of an episode to listen the next episode.
pageProps.title: Banana Streaming
